text: Today and every day, we honor and remember the brave heroes who served on #DDay. We owe our freedom to their sacrifices and those of their families. https://t.co/FLtBwYyzdP

Dedicated forecasters at @NWSSpokane are constantly evaluating weather conditions to keep us safe. With better forecasting tools, more meteorologists can provide real time data and information to help protect firefighters and our communities. https://t.co/z3TCgnu6xh

Happy #PrideMonth! From Stonewall to marriage equality, the LGBTQ+ community has made countless advances in the fight for equality. LGBTQ+ rights are human rights. I’m proud to stand with LGBTQ+ Americans and will continue fighting for legislation to protect the LGBTQ+ community. https://t.co/WU0V5t7DX2
The Senate must pass common sense measures to combat gun violence such as background checks and red flag laws. #WearOrange (2/2)

Today is National #GunViolenceAwarenessDay

Far too many Americans have lost a loved one to gun violence. It’s long past time for action. (1/2)

We owe it to our firefighters to make sure that they have the best data about changing winds that affect fire conditions. The Fire Ready Nation Act will provide precious resources for @NOAA to help our firefighters with better forecasting tools. https://t.co/gU8LnX1YLk
